examples.korean: After a shaky start, they fought back to win 3–2. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 불안정한 출발 후에 그들이 반격을 가해 3 대 2로 이겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After a shaky start, they fought back to win 3–2. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He ducked the first few blows then started to fight back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 처음에 주먹을 몇 차례 피하더니 반격을 가하기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He ducked the first few blows then started to fight back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His habit is to retort after people finish what they say. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 습관은 사람들이 한 말에 반격을 하는 것이다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: His habit is to retort after people finish what they say. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I tried to fight back, but I was on queer street from his first punch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 반격을 하려고 했으나 그한테 한 대를 맞고 정신이 멍했다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I tried to fight back, but I was on queer street from his first punch. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The Giants struck back and won the opener. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자이언츠는 반격했고 개막전을 이겼다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
